import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import './Playlists.css' import Song from './SongList/Itens' import Banner from '../images/banner.png' import Play from '../images/play.png' import Random from '../icones/random.png' import Edit from '../icones/edit.png' const PlaylisInfos = [ {id: 1, author: 'Mitsuaki', title: 'Sou Triste e DECADENTE', songs: 7} ]; fun const PlaylistSongs =[ {id: 1, cover: {}, name: 'Only One Who Knows', author: 'Arctic Monkeys', durantion: '3:04'}, {id: 2, cover: {}, name: 'Glipse of Us', author: 'Joji', durantion: '3:53'}, {id: 3, cover: {}, name: 'Sparks', author: 'Coldplay', durantion: '3:47'}, {id: 4, cover: {}, name: 'Grenade', author: 'Bruno Mars', durantion: '3:42'}, {id: 5, cover: {}, name: 'Rises the Moon', author: 'Liana Flores', durantion: '2:41'}, {id: 6, cover: {}, name: 'De 10 Mulher 11 é Maluca', author: 'Mc Saci', durantion: '1:47'}, {id: 7, cover: {}, name: 'Fogo Fátuo', author: 'Lupe De Lupe', durantion: '3:53'}, ] const Playlists = () => { return (
{/* The Cape of playlist */}
{/* Informations of Playlist */} {PlaylisInfos.map((Playlists) => (

  • {Playlists.title}

    Por: {Playlists.author} • {Playlists.songs} Músicas

))}
{PlaylistSongs.map((Song) => (
))}
) } export default Playlists;
